column3: Title
column5: 1.	Was the sample frame appropriate to address the target population?
column6: 2.	Were study participants sampled in an appropriate way?
column8: 4.	Were the study subjects and setting described in detail?
column9: 5.	Was data analysis conducted with sufficient coverage of the identified sample?
column10: 6.	Were valid methods used for the identification of the condition?
column11: 7.	Was the condition measured in a standard, reliable way for all participants?
column13: 9.	Was the response rate adequate, and if not, was the low response rate managed appropriately?
